payment.desc1: Go to your BKASH mobile menu by dialing 247# or go to BKASH app.
payment.desc3: Enter this number as recipient number: 01XXXXXXXXX
payment.desc5: Enter your BKASH Mobile Menu PIN now to confirm.
payment.desc6: If everything is OK, you will get a confirmation message from BKASH.
